description: "This late 19th century large-scale (1:30,000) map show just a section of the Siak River, in the Riau province of Sumatra. Bathymetry (water depth) is shown in figures to aid navigation, with various landmarks noted along the river’s banks."
title: "Oostkust Sumatra. Schetskaart der Siak Rivier : van het Eiland Tengah tot Siak / opgenomen door H.M. opnemingsvaartuig Melvill Van Carnbee, Commandant Luit. t/z 1e kl. R.O.J. Verschoor."
